FuncDef: The display radius-server accounting-start-packet command displays information about cached accounting-start packets.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a RADIUS server template.
The name is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

Specifies the IP address of a Radius server, in the dotted decimal format.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When checking configurations or troubleshooting RADIUS, you can run the display radius-server accounting-start-packet command to view information about Accounting Start packets on the RADIUS server.
The system can display only the number of cached accounting-start packets.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
